Texts.Chs: 嗯。这张双层床让我回想起我在大地守护团的日子。。。还有抵抗。
Texts.Eng: Mm. This bunk bed brings me back to my days at the Protectorate... and the resistance.

Texts.Chs: 这些床显然属于一个纪律严明的个体。
Texts.Eng: These beds clearly belong to a exceptionally disciplined individuals.

Texts.Chs: 这些床牺牲了基本的美感和舒适度，取而代之的是功能性。
Texts.Eng: These beds have sacrificed basic aesthetics and comfort for functionality.

Texts.Chs: 这些床显然是为了坚固，而不是舒适。
Texts.Eng: These beds were clearly meant for sturdiness, not comfort.

Texts.Chs: 哇，这些床做得很好。我猜他们不想让他们的训练中士大发雷霆。
Texts.Eng: Wow, these beds are well made. Guess they didn't want an earful from their drill sergeant.
